When Evidence Proving IRS or SSA Data Is Incorrect
If evidence is received proving the IRS or Social Security Administration (SSA) dataÂ is incorrect, adjudicate the claim based on the evidence of record.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 4, Section D - Federal Tax Information (FTI): Income Verification Match (IVM)
